description.raw:
Clarifying the navigation challenge scoring is under discussion.  This is an implementation of one of the options being discussed.  

To test

```
 WORLD=nav_challenge0b.world
 roslaunch vrx_gazebo vrx.launch verbose:=true       paused:=false       wamv_locked:=true       world:=${HOME}/vrx_ws/src/vrx/vrx_gazebo/worlds/${WORLD}
```

Number of gates = 3

Running time duration = 60

1. If USV doesn’t complete the course, score = 2\* \(60/3\)
2. If USV completes course, score = T/3, where T is elapsed time.

Note that the running score published is T/3.  If the running state times out, then the 2\*\(60/3\) score is set.

‌

‌
